alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 19 at 1:17AM MST until August 20 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 10 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Gila Bend and Sonoran Desert National Monument. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 10 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
